profile.title: Frontend Developer
profile.summary: Passionate and detail-oriented frontend developer with 5+ years of experience building web applications across industries. Strong proficiency in Vue.js, Nuxt.js, React, and modern frontend tooling.

about.heading: About Me
about.body: I focus on performance, maintainability, and clear collaboration. I enjoy shipping practical solutions that users can trust and teams can extend quickly.

highlights: Developed landing page using Nuxt.js + TypeScript + TailwindCSS with SEO configuration.
Built backend management system for National Telecom using Vue.js 3 + TailwindCSS.
Implemented login flow with reCAPTCHA and 2FA authentication.
Rewrote legacy CRM system using Vue.js 3.
Collaborated with PO, UX/UI designers, QA, and mentored junior developers.
Developed food delivery frontend using AngularJS + Laravel.
Maintained websites for food and beverage brands using WordPress.
Built ERP frontend using Vue.js and Nuxt.js.
Built ERP systems for construction and finance industries.
Used Vue.js and Nuxt.js for multi-module apps.
Supported junior developers and delivered solutions to international clients.
Refactored core insurance systems using Java.
